description:
4 panels orth America and Pelican Nebula - NGC7000, IC 5070 and IC 5067 and SH2-119 wide field captured 06/18/2018, 06/19/2018, 06/20/2018, 06/22/2019, 06/23/2018, 06/24/2018, 06/25/2018, 06/26/2018, and 06/28/2018
with Takahashi FSQ106ED @f/5 530mm focal length with ONAG XT (http://www.innovationsforesight.com/), Apogee Andore F16M monochrome @-25°C and Astrodon narrowband H-alpha, SII, OIII 5nm and RGB filters on 10micron GM2000 HPS II

86 x 20 minutes H-alpha unbinned = 28h40
85 x 2 minutes RGB unbinned = 2h50

SH2-119 SHO captured 05/28/2015, 06/02/2015, 06/03/2015, 07/06/2015, 07/09/2015, 07/10/2015, 07/11/2015, 07/13/2015, 07/14/2015 and 07/15/2015 with Takahashi FSQ106ED @f/5 530mm focal length with ONAG XT (http://www.innovationsforesight.com/), Apogee Alta U8300 monochrome @-30°C and Astrodon narrowband H-alpha, SII, OIII 5nm filters on 10micron GM2000 HPS II
63 x 10 minutes H-alpha unbinned = 10h30
55 x 10 minutes SII unbinned = 9h10
76 x 10 minutes OIII unbinned = 12h40

6 panels mosaic of North America and Pelican Nebula - NGC7000, IC 5070 and IC 5067 captured 04.14.2013,04.15.2013, 04.17.2013, 04.23.2013, 04.24.2013, and 04.25.2013 with Takahashi FSQ106ED @f/5 530mm focal length with Apogee Alta U8300 monochrome and Astrodon H-a, SII and OIII 5nm narrowband filters.
28 x 1200s H-a unbinned = 9h20
24 x 1200s OIII unbinned = 8h00
23 x 1200s SII unbinned = 7h40

Total exposure time = 88h30

POSS-II Survey (http://www.astro.caltech.edu/~wws/poss2.html) 81 panels of 60x60 arc/min for Red and Blue data) 

All subframes have been captured with SkySurveyor v3.1 full frame Guiding and Focusing : https://www.innovationsforesight.com/…/full-frame-guiding-…/
imaging_telescopes: Takahashi FSQ106 modified with Optec Gemini Focuser/Rotator and ONAG XT
title: NGC7000 and SH2-119 side by side - LRGB composition - Hybrid narrowband palette
